p.s: In his speech on the 7th November 2007, Obama wants to unite the Americans to fight for the American Dream.
He says the Americans in bigger Citiescities like Washington Becomingbecoming more separated by geography and ideology, race and religion, wealth and opportunity.
But in small towns like Iowa he hasn't be struck by their differences.
He is impressed by the Americans who share the same values and hopes that he shares.
The American Dreams are Dreamsdreams that drove the Americans since his Grandparentsgrandparents.
But the American Dream could never be reached.
His dream is to unite the Americans to reach the American dreamDream and he knows that dreams are worth to fighting for.
